name: Wizard King (itch)
description:
Wizard King is a strategy collectible card game. (CCG / TCG)

You can make your own powerful deck by gathering magic (cards) of Nordia (World of Wizard King) and composing them by duel with various opponents.

Let's be a Wizard King who is the first wizard of Nordia by great challenge.

Features

- Over 220 collectible cards

- 160 battle stages vs various opponents

- 40 interesting expedition stages
